detail.description: Oriental Hotels Limited is an associate company of The Indian Hotels Company Limited (IHCL). The company has seven hotels – Taj Coromandel, Chennai; Taj Fisherman’s Cove Resort & Spa, Chennai; Taj Malabar Resort & Spa, Cochin; Vivanta Coimbatore; Vivanta Mangalore; The Gateway Hotel Pasumalai, Madurai; and Gateway Coonoor – an IHCL SeleQtions hotel.[1]
